title: Security Advisory for PHP packages hosted at packagist.org
description: Security Advisory for PHP packages hosted at packagist.org on GitHub

items.content_html:
Craft CMS before 3.1.31 does not properly filter XML feeds, thus allowing XSS.

References

  • https://nvd.nist.gov/vuln/detail/CVE-2019-12823
  • https://github.com/craftcms/cms/commit/6432eca59b93bcea2ca2616199e5d419447e613f
  • https://github.com/craftcms/cms/blob/6432eca59b93bcea2ca2616199e5d419447e613f/CHANGELOG-v3.md
  • https://github.com/advisories/GHSA-w5q4-q7wp-qww6
items.title: [craftcms/cms] Craft CMS XSS Vulnerability

items.content_html:
phpMyAdmin 4.6.x before 4.6.3, when the environment lacks a PHP_SELF value, allows remote attackers to conduct cookie-attribute injection attacks via a crafted URI.

References

  • https://nvd.nist.gov/vuln/detail/CVE-2016-5702
  • https://github.com/phpmyadmin/phpmyadmin/commit/27caf5b46bd0890e576fea7bd7b166a0639fdf68
  • https://security.gentoo.org/glsa/201701-32
  • https://www.phpmyadmin.net/security/PMASA-2016-18/
  • https://github.com/advisories/GHSA-xqw9-ffx7-g998
items.title: [phpmyadmin/phpmyadmin] phpMyAdmin cookie-attribute injection

items.content_html:
An issue was discovered in phpMyAdmin involving the $cfg['ArbitraryServerRegexp'] configuration directive. An attacker could reuse certain cookie values in a way of bypassing the servers defined by ArbitraryServerRegexp. All 4.6.x versions (prior to 4.6.4), 4.4.x versions (prior to 4.4.15.8), and 4.0.x versions (prior to 4.0.10.17) are affected.

References

  • https://nvd.nist.gov/vuln/detail/CVE-2016-6629
  • https://security.gentoo.org/glsa/201701-32
  • https://www.phpmyadmin.net/security/PMASA-2016-52
  • https://web.archive.org/web/20210725054025/http://www.securityfocus.com/bid/92493
  • https://github.com/advisories/GHSA-567r-vqj7-5cw7
items.title: [phpmyadmin/phpmyadmin] phpMyAdmin Authentication Bypass

items.title: [phpmyadmin/phpmyadmin] phpMyAdmin Authentication Bypass

items.content_html:
Cross-site scripting (XSS) vulnerability in the table-structure page in phpMyAdmin 4.6.x before 4.6.3 allows remote attackers to inject arbitrary web script or HTML via vectors involving a comment.

References

  • https://nvd.nist.gov/vuln/detail/CVE-2016-5704
  • https://github.com/phpmyadmin/phpmyadmin/commit/72213573182896bd6a6e5af5ba1881dd87c4a20b
  • https://security.gentoo.org/glsa/201701-32
  • https://www.phpmyadmin.net/security/PMASA-2016-20/
  • https://github.com/advisories/GHSA-gcvp-cwgw-wx8j
items.title: [phpmyadmin/phpmyadmin] phpMyAdmin XSS Vulnerability

items.content_html:
An issue was discovered in phpMyAdmin. An authorized user can cause a denial-of-service (DoS) attack on a server by passing large values to a loop. All 4.6.x versions (prior to 4.6.4), 4.4.x versions (prior to 4.4.15.8), and 4.0.x versions (prior to 4.0.10.17) are affected.

References

  • https://nvd.nist.gov/vuln/detail/CVE-2016-6623
  • https://security.gentoo.org/glsa/201701-32
  • https://www.phpmyadmin.net/security/PMASA-2016-46
  • https://web.archive.org/web/20210123204343/http://www.securityfocus.com/bid/95052
  • https://github.com/advisories/GHSA-2mcj-3r3r-v5wm
items.title: [phpmyadmin/phpmyadmin] phpMyAdmin DoS Vulnerability

items.content_html:
An issue was discovered in phpMyAdmin. An authorized user can cause a denial-of-service (DoS) attack on a server by passing large values to a loop. All 4.6.x versions (prior to 4.6.4), 4.4.x versions (prior to 4.4.15.8), and 4.0.x versions (prior to 4.0.10.17) are affected.

References

  • https://nvd.nist.gov/vuln/detail/CVE-2016-6623

  • https://web.archive.org/web/20210123204343/http://www.securityfocus.com/bid/95052

items.content_html:
The qstr method in the PDO driver in the ADOdb Library for PHP before 5.x before 5.20.7 might allow remote attackers to conduct SQL injection attacks via vectors related to incorrect quoting.

References

  • https://nvd.nist.gov/vuln/detail/CVE-2016-7405
  • https://github.com/ADOdb/ADOdb/issues/226
  • https://github.com/ADOdb/ADOdb/commit/bd9eca9f40220f9918ec3cc7ae9ef422b3e448b8
  • https://github.com/ADOdb/ADOdb/blob/v5.20.7/docs/changelog.md
  • https://lists.fedoraproject.org/archives/list/package-announce@lists.fedoraproject.org/message/LT3WU77BRUJREZUYQ3ZQBMUIVIVIND4Y/
  • https://security.gentoo.org/glsa/201701-59
  • http://www.openwall.com/lists/oss-security/2016/09/07/8
  • http://www.openwall.com/lists/oss-security/2016/09/15/1
  • https://web.archive.org/web/20210123170727/http://www.securityfocus.com/bid/92969
  • https://github.com/advisories/GHSA-3fj4-q72x-x2g9
items.title: [adodb/adodb-php] ADOdb Library SQL Injection

items.content_html:
Laravel before 5.5.10 mishandles the remember_me token verification process because DatabaseUserProvider does not have constant-time token comparison.

References

  • https://nvd.nist.gov/vuln/detail/CVE-2017-14775
  • https://github.com/laravel/framework/pull/21320
  • https://github.com/laravel/framework/releases/tag/v5.5.10
  • https://laravel-news.com/laravel-v5-5-11
  • https://github.com/advisories/GHSA-c2v7-j5gq-wcq4
items.title: [laravel/framework] Laravel Sensitive Data Exposure

items.content_html:
An issue was discovered in phpMyAdmin. An unauthenticated user is able to execute a denial-of-service (DoS) attack by forcing persistent connections when phpMyAdmin is running with $cfg['AllowArbitraryServer']=true. All 4.6.x versions (prior to 4.6.4), 4.4.x versions (prior to 4.4.15.8), and 4.0.x versions (prior to 4.0.10.17) are affected.

References

  • https://nvd.nist.gov/vuln/detail/CVE-2016-6622
  • https://lists.debian.org/debian-lts-announce/2018/07/msg00006.html
  • https://security.gentoo.org/glsa/201701-32
  • https://www.phpmyadmin.net/security/PMASA-2016-45
  • https://web.archive.org/web/20210125183746/http://www.securityfocus.com/bid/95049
  • https://github.com/advisories/GHSA-qf3f-7x69-qfv3
items.title: [phpmyadmin/phpmyadmin] phpMyAdmin DoS Vulnerability

items.content_html:
The backend/Login/load/ script in Shopware before 5.1.5 allows remote attackers to execute arbitrary code.

References

  • https://nvd.nist.gov/vuln/detail/CVE-2016-3109
  • https://github.com/shopware/shopware/commit/d73e9031a5b2ab6e918eb86d1e2b2e873cd3558d
  • http://packetstormsecurity.com/files/136781/Shopware-Remote-Code-Execution.html
  • https://web.archive.org/web/20200814090044/http://www.securityfocus.com/archive/1/538173/100/0/threaded
  • https://web.archive.org/web/20210125193827/http://www.securityfocus.com/bid/97979
  • https://github.com/advisories/GHSA-cj2f-96jq-phpp
items.title: [shopware/shopware] Shopware RCE Vulnerability

items.content_html:
Symfony before 2.8.6 and 3.x before 3.0.6 allows remote attackers to bypass authentication by logging in with an empty password and valid username, which triggers an unauthenticated bind.

References

  • https://nvd.nist.gov/vuln/detail/CVE-2016-2403
  • https://www.debian.org/security/2018/dsa-4262
  • http://symfony.com/blog/cve-2016-2403-unauthorized-access-on-a-misconfigured-ldap-server-when-using-an-empty-password
  • https://web.archive.org/web/20210123224944/http://www.securityfocus.com/bid/96137
  • https://github.com/advisories/GHSA-wvj5-r78r-hhfq
items.title: [symfony/symfony] Symfony Authentication Bypass

items.content_html:
Symfony before 2.8.6 and 3.x before 3.0.6 allows remote attackers to bypass authentication by logging in with an empty password and valid username, which triggers an unauthenticated bind.

References

items.title: [symfony/symfony] Symfony Authentication Bypass

items.content_html:
SQL injection vulnerability found in Yii Framework Yii 2 Framework before v.2.0.47 allows the a remote attacker to execute arbitrary code via the runAction function.

References

  • https://nvd.nist.gov/vuln/detail/CVE-2023-26750
  • https://github.com/yiisoft/yii2/issues/19755
  • https://github.com/yiisoft/yii2/issues/19755#issuecomment-1426155955
  • https://github.com/yiisoft/yii2/issues/19755#issuecomment-1505390813
  • https://github.com/advisories/GHSA-gq63-p39p-jrjf
items.title: [yiisoft/yii2] SQL injectionin Yii 2

items.content_html:
Moodle 3.x has Server Side Request Forgery in the filepicker.

References

  • https://nvd.nist.gov/vuln/detail/CVE-2018-1042
  • https://moodle.org/mod/forum/discuss.php?d=364381
  • http://packetstormsecurity.com/files/153766/Moodle-Filepicker-3.5.2-Server-Side-Request-Forgery.html
  • https://github.com/moodle/moodle/commit/f1d1a60e0ac8549c08e66062f3cd0110e4a92e24
  • https://web.archive.org/web/20210124134113/http://www.securityfocus.com/bid/102752
  • https://github.com/advisories/GHSA-qqjv-mc2v-p7mc
items.title: [moodle/moodle] Moodle SSRF Vulnerability
